python gist
2014 - 10 - 14 
 1 import urllib
 2 import urllib2
 3 import re
 4 import time
 5 
 6 def grabSubdomain(popurl):
 7     #deal the popurl
 8     popurl = popurl.strip()
 9     if (popurl[:5] == 'http:'):
10         popurl=popurl[7:]     #get right URL
11     numT = popurl.find('/')
12     if (numT != -1):
13         popurl=popurl[:numT]
14     numDot = popurl.find('.')
15     popurl=popurl[numDot+1:]
16  
17  
18 if __name__ == '__main__':
19     print 'Start grab subdomain from i.links.cn...'
 1 var b = 1;
 2 var c = true;
 3 
 4 function fade(){
 5 if(document.all);
 6 
 7 if(c == true) {
 8 b++;
 9 }
10 if(b==100) {
11 b--;
12 c = false
13 }
14 
15 if(b==10) {
16 b++;
17 c = true;
18 }
19 
20 if(c == false) {
21 b--;
22 }
23 u.width=150 + b;
24 u.height=125 - b;
25 setTimeout("fade()",50);
26 }
